mapper.select: SELECT m.mr_id AS mrId ,m.mr_name AS mrName FROM wt_member_registration AS m WHERE m.mr_id = #{mrId};

SELECT m.mr_id AS mrId ,m.mr_name AS mrName ,m.mr_join_date AS mrJoinDate ,r.pm_r_title AS pMRTitle ,m.mr_account_num AS mrAccountNum FROM wt_member_registration AS m INNER JOIN wt_payment_resource AS r on m.pm_r_code = r.pm_r_code WHERE m.mr_id = #{mrId};
SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(pr.p_r_ect,'or',-1) AS pREct ,pr.p_r_title AS pRTitle FROM wt_pay_resource AS pr;
SELECT m.mr_id AS mrId ,m.mr_name AS mrName FROM wt_member_registration AS m WHERE m.level_num = 3;

SELECT c.mr_id AS mrId ,c.opc_hourly_wage AS opcHourlyWage ,m.mr_name AS mrName ,c.opc_base_pay AS opcBasePay ,c.opc_food_expenses AS opcFoodExpenses ,c.opc_transportation AS opcTransportation ,c.opc_welfare AS opcWelfare ,c.opc_bonus AS opcBonus ,c.opc_ect AS opcEct ,c.opc_total AS opcTotal ,d.opd_income_tax AS opdIncomeTax ,d.opd_resident_income_tax AS opdResidentIncomTax ,d.opd_employment_insurance AS opdEmploymentInsurance ,d.opd_national_pension AS opdNationalPension ,d.opd_health_insurance AS opdHealthInsurance ,d.opd_longterm_nursing_insurance AS opdLongtermNursingInsurance ,d.opd_total AS opdTotal ,p.op_pay AS opPay ,c.opc_total_hour AS opcTotalHour ,d.iy_code AS iyCode ,pr.p_r_title AS pRTitle ,m.mr_join_date AS mrJoinDate ,r.pm_r_title AS pmRTitle ,m.mr_account_num AS mrAccountNum FROM wt_officers_pay AS p INNER JOIN wt_officers_pay_calculate AS c ON p.mr_id=c.mr_id LEFT join wt_officers_pay_deduction AS d ON p.mr_id = d.mr_id LEFT JOIN wt_member_registration AS m ON p.mr_id = m.mr_id LEFT JOIN wt_payment_resource AS r ON m.pm_r_code = r.pm_r_code LEFT JOIN wt_pay_resource AS pr ON p.p_r_code = pr.p_r_code WHERE p.mr_id = #{mrId};
